source_caption_data.pre_caption: This close-up, top-down shot initially frames a piece of paper with a drawing in the center-left middle ground. A right hand in the foreground is positioned over the drawing in the top-right quadrant, while a left hand, also in the foreground, holds the paper's edge at the bottom-left. The right hand moves away from the drawing and off-screen to the right. Both hands then re-enter the frame from the left and right sides to grasp a reddish-brown box in the center-right middle ground. As the hands lift the lid, the open box, filled with various keepsakes, comes to occupy the center and right portions of the frame. The hands remain in the foreground on either side of the box, while the original drawing is now partially visible in the bottom-left corner.
